subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: John Degenkolb of Germany won a group sprint in Lyon, France, to take the second stage of the Criterium du Dauphine, while Alexandre Vinokourov of Kazakhstan retained the leader’s yellow jersey by 11 seconds.
snippet: John Degenkolb of Germany won a group sprint in Lyon, France, to take the second stage of the Criterium du Dauphine, while Alexandre Vinokourov of Kazakhstan retained the leader’s yellow jersey by 11 seconds.
